page.title: 18Shopping in Kingswood.
page.content: Most families use the Kings Chase{ {shopping precinct}at least once a week, usually to shop for food at one of the{supermarkets.}The adjacent car park makes it easy to load shopping straight into a car, but many people dislike having to pay to use it.There are a lot of{banks}nearby.Children and adults use{Building Societies}for saving.There is a choice of{shoe shops but most people like to go to Bristol to buy clothes.Adults make regular visits to use the{greengrocers, {bakers,chemists and hairdresser.} Children like to use the{toy shop, the {sports shop and the book and record {shop.}About 1/2 of the people questioned use the fish and chip shops but parking restictions limit their use during the day. People usually buy petrol at a local{garage}and have their car serviced there.
